    A loop body that computes and returns a value for an int index.
    Parameter
    A parameter - a named value (or array of values) with a type and (optional) units.
    ParameterConvertException
    Exception thrown by Parameter when it cannot convert a parameter value to some specified type.
    ParameterSet
    A parameter set - a collection of named parameters and parameter subsets.
    ParameterSetFormatException
    Exception thrown when the format of a parameter set is not valid.

    RTree.Boxer

    Units
    A class for dimensional analysis of and conversions among units of measure.
    UnitsFormatException
    Exception thrown by Units for a malformed units definition.
